product_name: Trigger Point Performance Starter Set With DVD
long_description: Use the Trigger Point Performance starter set with DVD to help bring relief to aches and pains in your feet, Achilles tendons, shins, calves and other lower leg muscles. Set includes the Foot Roller massager, Massage ball, Baller Block, and instructional DVD. Use the Foot Roller to massage your calves and soleus muscles; the Baller Block elevates your feet and lower legs to help them relax. Apply pressure with the Massage ball to bring relief to minor aches and pains in your neck, shoulders, back, chest and calves. Trigger Point Performance starter set includes an instructional DVD to help you get started on properly using the Foot Roller, Massage ball and Baller Block.
short_description: Use the Trigger Point Performance starter set with DVD to help bring relief to aches and pains in your feet, Achilles tendons, shins, calves and other lower leg muscles.
